colors.summary: PatternFly’s colors have been carefully selected to support flexible and effective visual communication. Our colors help us create more accessible and inclusive user experiences.

icons.summary: PatternFly supports a range of icons of different sizes and colors to enhance components and indicate functionality.

spacers.summary: PatternFly uses spacers to lay out components using a consistent spacing system and simplify communication between designers and developers.

typography.summary: PatternFly’s typography guidelines allow designers to use different font and text styles to create strong visual hierarchies.

usage-and-behavior.summary: There are a handful of common design scenarios where multiple PatternFly components could be used. Our guidelines direct designers to the best component for each case.
